TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ModifierKeysConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在 对象与其他类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "+" 字符作为分隔符,转换为和。 The converts to and from a using the "+" character as the delimiter. 例如, 将`Control+ALT`字符串转换为包含和键的对象。For example, the string `Control+ALT` would be converted into a object consisting of the and keys. 此行为不同于默认的 XAML 分析器级枚举 "," 的组合字符。This behavior differs from the default XAML parser-level enumeration combine character of ",".
